ygData.subject: Re: Is Jewelcraft Broke?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Enchanters of Norrath Just to tell you that Jade rings sell for 20 plat each I sell em faster at 16-15 plat so Let s not make our prices too cheap,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Enchanters of Norrath
Just to tell you that Jade rings sell for 20 plat each
I sell em faster at 16-15 plat so Let's not make our
prices too cheap, Because if we do that than people
will expect even cheaper and well that's how normal
expensive things get so cheap. From my studies The +5
mana is mana Regeneration, I mean my +2 mana robe
can't just add 2 mana and when i wear it i notice a
diffrence over time especially with the two +5 mana
rings. So Don't sell at cost or anything unless it's a
really good friend or a guild member.
I wan't to protect our economy (And our money)
Especially those in innoruk which i am on
I am Explorer There
The Wanderer
*May The Wanderer's Show you the way*

--- HiFi Review <hifireview@...> wrote:
> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> Jewelcraft is not broken. You can get up to skill
> 40 with jade before
> it becomes trivial. Perhaps it went up and you
> didn't notice? Maybe
> you just need to make some more. :)
>
> The going rate for Jaded Silver rings sold to PCs is
> 8P, don't
> undersell them or you'll ruin the business for all
> of us. Sometimes I
> give a 1P discount to people who buy 2. And selling
> to your friends is
> an all together different story anyway.
>
> It cost me probably 50 P to get to skill 40.,
> that's 50 P earned from
> monsters, not including sell back money. I've had
> some serious bad
> luck streaks. lots of failures with jade and pearl.
>
> Q d'E
>
